title: Emei Watch Face
summary: Emei displays beautiful backgrounds that change based on your time of day.
description: Emei displays beautiful backgrounds that change based on your time of day.
descriptionHTML: Emei displays beautiful backgrounds that change based on your time of day.
comments: More Please. Like what I see so far; the two faces are lovely. Would like to see more faces, though--not just the day or night either/or. Dawn? Sunset, for starters? Also, definitely, desperately needs ambient mode. Happy to donate to help.
Beautiful, but needs work The backgrounds in this watchface are quite gorgeous, but the lack of an ambient display mode is a deal breaker for me.
